runs.comm: length delivery on the stumps, it is tucked to square leg
on the pads again, this is again flicked to the leg side, a touch to the left of square leg
he bowls it wide outside off for Kamran, the batsman lets it go through
another one outside off and again Kamran lets it go through
whoa! This one swings back in and the batsman didn't account for that, this one cuts him in half and bounces over the middle stump
short, wide, crashed through cover point! He wipes off the memory of that previous miss with a cracking shot
back of length on off, the batsman waits on the back foot and whips it to wide mid on for a single
length delivery on off, the batsman dabs it to mid-on for a quick single
you bowl it full on their pads, you pay for it! This one was going down leg and Shehzad flicks it over backward square leg
he comes forward and pushes the length delivery to midwicket
fuller delivery on off, this is brilliantly driven down the ground.. Straight, and no chance for the mid-on fielder
he gets an inside edge to backward square leg as he looks to punch it to off
length delivery on off, he waits in the crease and defends it to mid-off
first big shot from Shehzad! He clears his front leg out and whacks it over midwicket with a powerful swipe
again, he moves a touch to the leg side, looks to heave it to the leg side, but rolls the wrists as it is a touch slower, finds the boundary at deep backward square leg
superb shot! He came down the pitch early, but plays a classical cover drive after making the slower ball a half volley
bowls it slower on off, length delivery, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
beautifully hit! First six of the match, he comes down the pitch and lofts this handsomely over long off.. That's gone a long way, it just looked like a chip shot..
bowls it slower on off, the batsman defends it towards point
gets a big top edge as he looks to sweep this, but this is safe... flies over the backward square leg fielder and runs away to the boundary
everyone misses this! He looks to swat this flatter delivery to the leg side, misses, the keeper misses it too
tossed up delivery on the stumps, defended to the leg side
he goes on the back foot and punches it straight to cover
loud appeal for lbw as Kamran tries to sweep it from outside off, but the impact was outside off
he goes back and whips the flatter delivery to deep midwicket easily for a single
he goes deep into the crease and tries to cut it from in front of the stumps, hits it straight to point

super catch this time  by ZIA! He tried one of these the other day too, but he doesn't miss it this time.. Kamran gets a big top edge again as he looks to sweep - that bounced a touch extra. Zia does very well, he back pedals at short fine leg, keeps his eyes on the ball and stretches at the last moment.. Takes a tumble after that.. a very good catch
pushed through on the stumps, the batsman defends it off the back foot
he comes down the pitch and pushes the fuller delivery to wide mid on for a single
this is quicker, but this is way down the leg side
they take a single off the extra delivery as Shehzad dabs it to the offside
tossed up and slower on off, the batsman dabs it to off and calls for a quick single too
floated up to the batsman, he comes forward and defends
he goes on the back foot and dabs the flatter delivery to point
quicker delivery, it's the slider, keeps coming in to the batsman, who defends it to the leg side and calls for a quick single
he goes deep into the crease and works it away to deep square leg for a single
comes down the pitch and whips the fuller delivery to deep midwicket for a single
goes back and chops the flatter delivery to short third man
he waits in the crease, allows it to come to him, then works it away to deep midwicket
floated up to the batsman, Shehzad is looking very solid, picks up a single by dabbing it softly to midwicket
and Prof is happy to use his feet, he comes down the pitch and pushes this to long off
on the pads, the batsman misses his flick
another single to short midwicket! They have been happy picking these ones..
strange shot! He goes for a paddle on a full delivery wide outside off, misses it completely.. It flicks the pads and goes to the keeper
this is better! Why do fancy stuff when you can do simple stuff so nicely! He slams this fuller delivery with a beautiful inside-out drive over cover.. What more, it travels all the way
waits on the back foot and calls for a quick couple to midwicket. The fielders are in the deep, that was quick thinking
he goes wide outside off and tries that paddle shot again! It misses the bat, misses the of stump by a whisker.. Why, you have to ask!
slower delivery on off, he punches this firmly through cover point, that is a good shot.. picks up a couple
highish full toss on off, easily punched to long on for a single
tossed up delivery outside off, driven down to deep extra cover
full toss wide outside off, the batsman eases it to deep cover
another dab to midwicket for an easy single
comes down the pitch and peppers that deep extra cover region again, a couple this time

he is been done in by the flight here! Comes down the pitch like he has been doing all day, but this one is much shorter from Razzak, it grips the surface and turns past the outside edge. Hafeez doesn't even bother to see the damage behind him.
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and defends it down the crease
he waits on the back foot and dabs it to backward point for an easy single that brings up his half-century
another one goes! Umar Akmal, the hero from the other night, he gets a thick outside edge and Tamim takes a dipping catch at short third man.. The days is just getting better for Bangladesh
nicely floated up from the bowler, this turns in after pitching, the batsman defends
he waits on the back foot and opens the face of the bat to run it fine on the off side for a single
flatter and shorter, Shehzad has been smartly doing this all day and he does it again, pushes it softly through mid on and comes back for a couple
he works it away on the leg side from outside off, keeps the strike
starts off with one down the leg side, the keeper doesn't pick it cleanly, allows an extra run
really slow this one! This is tossed up wide outside off, the batsman comes forward to defend, gets an inside edge to the leg side
flatter this time, the batsman pushes it to cover point for a single
he comes down the pitch and punches it to deep midwicket for a single
he waits on the back foot and pushes it straight to cover point
tossed up outside off, the batsman pushes it softly to cover for a quick single
flatter delivery on off, Malik waits for it and runs it down past short third man neatly
quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it straight to midwicket
slightly slower this time from the bowler, the batsman goes back and punches it to deep cover
bowls this one with a pause, doesn't make much impact as Shehzad whips this to the leg side for a single
he stays back to a fuller delivery, pushes it to long on for a single
this is a low full toss, but the batsman calmly punches it to long on
this is a tight second! The batsman clips it to wide long on but he is struggling to get back.. Makes it just in time
that's a mighty hoick! Ziaur's gentle pace is all they need, he hits it through the line and whacks it over deep midwicket
he follows it up with a deft touch through backward point now.. Sees the bowler roll his fingers, so waits and just runs it down through the gap.. Neat shot
and now picks up a smart single with a push to deep midwicket
he waits on the back foot, dabs it fine on the off side for an easy single
this is the repeat of the first ball! It's a slower delivery on off and Shehzad picks it up easily with a full swing of the bat, over deep midwicket..
and this is the repeat of the second ball shot! Ziaur offers width, the batsman has no problem as he cuts this through backward point. Fantastic batting from Shehzad
low full toss on the pads, Malik picks up a quick couple with a flick to deep backward square leg
tossed up delivery on the off side, easily driven to deep midwicket
he goes deep in the crease and nudges the spinning delivery to deep backward square leg
that's the third full toss in this over, this time the batsman is ready for it, he thrashes it through midwicket with a powerful whip
through the off side now! It was full and wide, Malik bends his knees and pulls out a sumptuous off drive.. The fielder gets behind it, but lets it slip to the boundary.. poor effort there
short and on the stumps, the batsman pulls it to deep midwicket for a single
tossed up delivery, the batsman comes forward and defends
flatter delivery on off, he takes a quick single with a dab towards cover
he comes down the pitch and smartly chips it over extra cover with an inside out drive.. picks up a couple
is this the end of Shehzad! No, he is lucky.. He gets a thick top edge as he looks to pull this short delivery, but it lands safely at midwicket.. the fielders are in the deep..Big repreive
comes down the pitch very early, the bowler slows it down. Malik gets an inside edge to midwicket as he looks to flog this to off side
full and wide, easy decision for the umpire
tossed up and full on the stumps, the batsman calmly pushes it to wide long on for a single
tries to to an AB again! and fails again.. This is the third time he has tried that paddle shot by going wide outside off and third time, he misses it.. The ball misses the off stump
now he moves to the leg side and Mortaza fires it in his direction. The batsman, smartly, comes in.. It's a huge wide down the leg side
this is beautifully hit over extra cover! He moves to the leg side and smashes the fuller delivery with an inside out drive
this is a strange shot! He starts jogging down the pitch.. not walking.. jogging.. But gets a leading edge that lands safely at mid-off
he hops on the crease and whips the back of length delivery to deep midwicket
and this one is nicely timed! Mashrafe tries the short ball but Shehzad pulls it comfortably behind square leg.. all along the ground..
he waits on the back foot and pushes this length delivery to deep midwicket to keep the strike
bowls it full on off, the batsman drives it straight to extra cover
bowls a full toss outside off, the batsman just punches it straight down past the bowler for a couple.. Could have hit it anywhere really
loud cry of disappointment from Shehzad as he misses a cut shot! He is beaten by the lack of pace there
shuffles to the off side and chips the fuller delivery to long on.. But this is hit softly, so they come back for a second
good slower ball again from Al-Amin, the batsman almost gives him a return catch
he waits on the back foot and punches the length delivery to deep extra cover with a straight bat
floated up to the batsman, who dabs it to cover for a single and move one close to his maiden century
he makes good adjustment here! Malik was making room while coming down the pitch, Shakb fires it wide outside off.. Somehow, he manages to get a little bat there
he works it away to deep midwicket to move to 99..
this time he has done it! This is the repeat of what happened two balls ago, but this time Malik misses it and is stumped! He moved way too early and Shakib fired it wide outside off
fuller delivery wide outside off, Lala gets off the mark with a powerful drive to long off

he gets there with a neat drive through cover! The first Pakistan batsmen to get to the landmark.. Well played Shehzad.. The most noticeable bit is that he hasn't really knocked the cover off the ball, done it so easily
now he opens up! Mortaza digs it short and Shezad powers it over square leg with no-nonsense pull
not this time! He smashes the fuller delivery straight to long-on, to Tamim.. Oh no, this is a no-ball.. This is a big no-ball. What a day for the man..!
he murders this full delivery over extra cover! Afridi is not going to let these ones go.. So much power
another powerful hit in the same area!Mashrafe is allowing a lot of room for Afridi to swing his arms.. Anamul takes the catch at the edge of the boundary, but falls over the ropes
short and wide, the batsman lets it go and checks with the umpire to see if it's a wide.. it's not
length delivery, Lala swings across the line but doesn't get hold of it.. Straight to the man at deep midwicket
full and wide outside off, Shehzad guides it easily pass the short third man fielder! This is poor from Bangladesh.. Pakistan are running away with this
Lala looks to smash the back of length delivery over cover, but gets a thick edge over backward point.. There is no one back there..
the batsman slices this full delivery straight to that man at third man...it's a single.. No, they sneak a second as Mushy doesn't gather the throw cleanly
length delivery outside off, the batsman whacks it to deep midwicket .. There wasn't any timing on that shot, so the fielder got time to cut it off
length delivery, again he doesn't get full hold of this, flat-bats it straight to long-on. No no-ball this time
fuller delivery this is another wicket! No, this is a poor drop from Nasir at long-off. Simple chance, he gets ample time to settle under it and just drops it like that..
good delivery, full and outside off, the batsman can only hit it to long-on
